title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Gains 3.5% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Solana (SOL) jumped 6.4% and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) rose 5.3%, leading index higher.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2375.69, up 3.5% (+79.38) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SOL (+6.4%) and BCH (+5.3%).

Laggards: HBAR (+1.5%) and DOT (+2.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index gained 3.5% with all 20 assets trading higher, led by SOL (+6.4%) and BCH (+5.3%).
